doc.name: ArraySum
doc.description: Compute the sum of the elements in an array. This actor reads an array from the input port and sends the sum of its elements to the output port. The output data type is at least the type of the elements of the input array. The elements of the input array have to support addition, or an exception will be thrown in the fire() method. This actor is similar to ArrayAverage, except that it supports data types that do not support division by an integer.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee, Christine Avanessians
